entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 9:59 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:59 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
